name: redux-saga-connect
description: redux-saga-connect is a decorator react components to connect the sagas runtime.

scripts.release:patch: npm run preversion && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run preversion && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run preversion && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
